name: adapt-page2TextFile
displayName: Convert Course Page to Text File
description: This extension will take the current course page you are on and save it to a text file. Please note the button will not show in the drawer until '?dev=save' is typed in front of the # in the URL path. This is so that users will not be able to see question feedback potentially giving them the answers in the course when the page is saved to a text file.
